readable.title: 2538477523_1da77eb11c
readable.content: A girl in a dress runs followed by a man in jeans . A man and a little girl are running on a walkway . A man chases a little girl in a flowery dress down a paved trail . A man chasing a young girl wearing a red white and blue skirt . Man in maroon shirt running behind a running girl wearing a red , white and blue tutu .
